DOC.brief_summary: The investigators wish to compare the efficacy and patient tolerability of a preparation consisting of 2L Bi-Peglyte plus 15mg of bisacodyl vs the standard preparation of 4L Peglyte. The investigators hypothesize that 2L Bi-Peglyte with 15mg bisacodyl will show higher efficacy and tolerability.
DOC.brief_title: Comparing 2L Bi-Pegyte to 4L PegLyte Regiments for Outpatient Colonic Preparation
DOC.criteria: Age 19 or older Outpatient colonoscopy constipation
